summary: We were asked to provide information about authorizations and appropriations relevant to the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2023. Authorizations are laws that establish or continue the operation of a federal program or agency. Some authorizations include an authorization of appropriations, which sanctions a particular type of spending within a program. But authorizations of appropriations aren’t required. We identified authorizations and authorizations of appropriations relevant to the...
title: Federal Budget: Authorization and Appropriation Information for Selected Agencies
